title: Wild Archer: Castle Defense
description: Wild Archer: Castle Defense is a casual game where you are the last surviving archer hero and defender of your kingdom, embark on an epic journey to reclaim your castle, rescue the princess, and restore your empire to its former glory! Face relentless waves of invaders, expand your castle, and build a formidable defense to thwart your enemies. Are you ready to defend your walls and restore glory to your realm?
